channel.title: Why arent there any commands on DarkQuest?
channel.description: I know its easy as hell to add them in, but just wondering why arent there any there (besides "say")? Also, I noticed that there is no "help" command on the the handler, but ::help works ingame. Why is that?

item.title: Why arent there any commands on DarkQuest?
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

Ahh now i see them, they are in plugins

Read full topic
item.source: Why arent there any commands on DarkQuest?

item.title: Why arent there any commands on DarkQuest?
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

There are a lot of commands in DarkQuest. I think you’re just looking in the wrong places. After looking through the files in org/darkquest/gs/plugins/commands, I found these commands:
For Admins:
ban
shutdown
update
appearance
item
grounditem
object
door
dropall
f2pwild
p2pwild
thread
noaggro
doublexp

For Mods:
modroom
npc

For Player Mods:
info
town
goto/summon
blink
teleport
kick
nopk

For Regular Users:
say
help
skull
fatigue
online
onlinelist
stuck

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Why arent there any commands on DarkQuest?
